courseDetails.title: Sarbanes-Oxley & ISO 9001: Mastering Corporate Governance

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Sarbanes-Oxley & ISO 9001: Mastering Corporate Governance", your definitive guide to navigating the intricate landscape of corporate governance with precision and expertise.

In this comprehensive course, we unravel the complexities of two pivotal standards—Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) and ISO 9001—delving into their profound impact on organizational management. Whether you're a seasoned professional or new to the corporate world, this course equips you with the knowledge and skills needed to master the principles and applications of these standards.

Key Learning Areas:

  1. Regulatory Foundations: Gain a deep understanding of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act and ISO 9001, exploring their origins, key provisions, and the regulatory frameworks they establish for corporate governance.

  2. Strategic Integration: Learn to strategically integrate Sarbanes-Oxley and ISO 9001, unlocking synergies that contribute to better financial reporting, increased operational efficiency, and the establishment of robust internal controls.

  3. Practical Implementation: Acquire actionable strategies for the efficient implementation of Sarbanes-Oxley and ISO 9001 within organizational structures. Real-world case studies provide practical insights into successful application.

  4. Competitive Advantage: Understand how to leverage Sarbanes-Oxley and ISO 9001 to create a competitive advantage. Explore the ways these standards can be harnessed to enhance overall business performance.

By the end of this course, you'll not only grasp the intricacies of Sarbanes-Oxley and ISO 9001 but also be equipped with the practical know-how to apply these standards effectively in your professional journey. Whether you're aiming for managerial roles, involved in quality management, or leading an organization, this course empowers you to elevate your expertise in mastering corporate governance.

Enroll now and unlock the path to corporate excellence!
targetAudiences: Aspiring and Current Managers: Individuals aiming for managerial roles or already in management positions will benefit by gaining insights into how Sarbanes-Oxley and ISO 9001 shape corporate governance and management practices.

Corporate Executives and Leaders: Executives and leaders responsible for guiding organizations through compliance and quality management will find the course instrumental in honing their strategic understanding of SOX and ISO 9001.

Finance and Accounting Professionals: Professionals in finance and accounting seeking to enhance their knowledge of regulatory frameworks and their impact on financial reporting will find practical applications and relevance in this course.

Quality Management Practitioners: Those involved in quality management or interested in implementing ISO 9001 standards will gain practical insights into improving processes, reducing costs, and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Students Pursuing Business or Finance Degrees: Students in business, finance, or related fields will find the course to be a valuable supplement to their academic studies, providing real-world applications of corporate governance principles.

Entrepreneurs and Business Owners: Entrepreneurs and business owners aiming to establish robust governance structures and quality management systems within their organizations will discover actionable strategies and benefits.

Anyone Interested in Corporate Governance: The course is open to anyone with an interest in understanding how Sarbanes-Oxley and ISO 9001 contribute to corporate governance. No prior experience is required, making it accessible to beginners.

courseDetails.title: Azure Devops CI/CD Pipelines with YAML | Practical Demos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Create CI/CD pipelines for Azure DevOps using YAML. Automation examples/demos from real world scenarios.
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this course you will learn how to master Azure YAML pipelines by building real world scenarios from production setups. The main goal of this course is to familiarise yourself with the available commands that Microsoft provides on the pipelines in order to build complex automation projects. Course is focused on practical examples of pipeline use cases that you can build and exercise on Azure DevOps platform. Those examples vary and depend on various services either azure internal or external that you can use plug n play in order to build, deploy and secure your infrastructure and deployments. Through the curriculum you can learn all the components required in order to create automation cases and understand how the tooling works in depth.


Course is mainly focused on practical demos and examples that you can use plug-n-play in your everyday work as a DevOps engineer.


Some of the objectives that you will learn are:

  1. cron schedules

  2. build pipelines

  3. release pipelines

  4. repositories

  5. devops tools

  6. environments

  7. approvals

  8. variables and parameters

  9. devops agents


DevOps tools that are covered through this course:

  1. Python

  2. Terraform

  3. Ansible

  4. .NET

  5. NodeJS

  6. Azure Web apps

  7. azure cli

  8. Kubernetes

  9. Docker

  10. DevSecOps


DevSecOps tools that are covered through this course:

  1. Sonarqube

  2. Trivy

  3. Gitleaks

  4. Snyk


Examples pipelines that are included:

  • hello-world-pipeline
    Create a hello world YAML pipeline

  • share-variables
    Share local variables between jobs and tasks

  • predefined-variables
    Use predefined variables for Working Directories, Git Repositories and Artifacts

  • build-strategy
    Build pipelines continuous integration strategy

  • terraform-az-lin-win

  • rest-api-object
    Pipeline which triggers a pipeline using Azure devops REST Api

  • called-from-rest-api
    Pipeline with a parameter object as input which should be called from a REST API

  • unit-tests-azuredevops
    Build unit tests and publish on Azure devops

  • conditions
    Conditionally run tasks inside pipelines

  • build-dotnet
    Build a .NET application

  • deploy-appservice
    Build and deploy appservice on Azure

  • pipeline-templates
    Using a template structure for devops pipelines

  • start-vm-loop
    Start VMs on Azure using loops

  • cron-schedule
    Run a pipeline based on a cron schedule

  • environmet-approval
    Create build and release pipelines approvals using environments

  • multi-repo-checkout
    Checkout multiple git repositories on azure devops pipelines

  • variables-parameters
    Using variables and parameters on YAML pipelines

  • stages-jobs-tasks
    Stages, jobs and tasks inside a YAML pipeline

  • execute-ansible
    Execute ansible playbooks through azure devops

  • python-execution
    Execute python scripts

  • build-nodejs
    Build node JS applications using npm tool

  • update-build-number
    Update pipeline name by changing build number

  • install-win-software
    Install software (exe, msi) on windows machines

  • execute-command
    Execute command on a virtual server without username and password

  • starting-template
    Starting template with stage, job, tasks

  • push-package-feed
    Push a package to Artifact feeds

  • kubernetes-deployment
    Deploy nginx on kubernetes cluster

  • manual-validation
    Execute tasks based on manual validation

  • jmeter-loadtest
    Use Jmeter for performance testing

  • stage-dependencies
    Create deployment workflows with stage dependencies

  • jobs-dependencies
    Create execution workflows with job dependencies

  • dependson-variable
    Dynamic dependencies with variables and parameters

  • acr-build-push
    Build dotnet microservice and push on container registry

  • code-scan-trivy
    Scan code projects with trivy

  • snyk-scan-container
    Scan container images with snyk

  • gitleaks-scan
    Scan for passwords and secrets with gitleaks

  • azure-load-testing
    Load test websites with Azure Load testing

  • sonarqube-scan
    Use Quality Gates and scan source code with sonarqube

  • run-pipeline-after-another

courseDetails.title: Real World Machine Learning Project In Python From Scratch
courseDetails.shortDescription: Complete Real World Machine Learning Project In Python From Scratch

Course Title: Real World Machine Learning Project in Python From Scratch

Course Description:

Welcome to the Real World Machine Learning Project in Python From Scratch course, an immersive experience that takes you through the entire lifecycle of building a practical machine learning project. Whether you're a novice curious about the end-to-end process or an intermediate learner eager to enhance your skills, this course is crafted to guide you through the complexities of real-world machine learning projects using Python.

What You Will Learn:

  1. Introduction to Real-World Machine Learning:

    • Delve into the principles and applications of machine learning in real-world scenarios, exploring its diverse applications across industries.

  2. Selecting a Project and Defining Goals:

    • Learn how to choose a machine learning project, define clear goals, and understand the business or problem context for effective project planning.

  3. Data Collection and Exploration:

    • Master techniques for collecting and preparing data, performing exploratory data analysis (EDA) to extract valuable insights essential for project success.

  4. Data Preprocessing and Cleaning:

    • Understand the significance of data preprocessing and cleaning, and implement strategies to handle missing values, outliers, and other data anomalies.

  5. Feature Engineering:

    • Dive into the world of feature engineering, enhancing model performance by selecting, transforming, and creating relevant features to drive better predictions.

  6. Choosing and Implementing Machine Learning Algorithms:

    • Explore a variety of machine learning algorithms, gain the skills to select the most suitable ones for your project, and implement them using Python.

  7. Model Training and Evaluation:

    • Grasp the process of training machine learning models, optimize hyperparameters, and evaluate model performance using industry-standard metrics.

  8. Hyperparameter Tuning and Model Optimization:

    • Dive deep into hyperparameter tuning techniques and optimization strategies, ensuring your models are fine-tuned for efficiency and accuracy.

  9. Building a Predictive System:

    • Learn the steps to build a predictive system, integrating your machine learning model and deploying it for making real-world predictions.

  10. Monitoring and Maintaining Models:

    • Understand the importance of monitoring and maintaining machine learning models to ensure ongoing relevance and accuracy in dynamic environments.

  11. Ethical Considerations and Best Practices:

    • Engage in meaningful discussions about ethical considerations in machine learning projects and adhere to best practices for responsible development.


Why Enroll:

  • Hands-On Project: Engage in a comprehensive hands-on project to reinforce your learning through practical application.

  • Real-World Applications: Acquire skills applicable to real-world scenarios, enhancing your ability to create effective machine learning solutions.

  • Community Support: Join a community of learners, share experiences, and seek assistance from instructors and peers throughout your learning journey.

Embark on this practical learning adventure and become proficient in building a Real World Machine Learning Project in Python From Scratch. Enroll now and gain the skills to create impactful machine learning solutions!

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


ChatGPT es un sistema de chat basado en el modelo de lenguaje por Inteligencia Artificial GPT-3, desarrollado por la empresa OpenAI. Es un modelo con más de 175 millones de parámetros, y entrenado con grandes cantidades de texto para realizar tareas relacionadas con el lenguaje, desde la traducción hasta la generación de texto.

courseDetails.title: Personal Productivity & Life Planning
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Course: Personal Productivity, Life Planning, Values Analysis, Burnout Prevention, Work-life Balance, VUCA
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Personal Productivity

Course provided by MTF Institute


Personal productivity is a crucial skill set for individuals seeking career success and personal happiness in today's fast-paced and demanding world. This comprehensive course on Personal Productivity is designed to provide participants with the necessary tools, strategies, and mindset to optimize their management skills, enhance leadership abilities, and achieve personal and professional goals. By focusing on key topics such as time management, goal setting, and self-development, this course empowers individuals to cultivate a productive and fulfilling life.


Introduction to Personal Productivity

In this module, participants will be introduced to the concept of personal productivity and its significance in their career and overall happiness. They will explore various theories and models related to productivity enhancement, setting the stage for a comprehensive understanding of the course. Key topics include:


The Ying Yang Concept

Understanding the delicate balance between work and personal life is essential for achieving sustainable productivity and maintaining a healthy well-being. Participants will learn strategies to strike a harmonious equilibrium between professional responsibilities and personal fulfillment.


Balance Wheel

The Lecture Balance Wheel is a powerful tool for evaluating and assessing various dimensions of life, such as health, relationships, career, finances, personal growth, and leisure. Participants will learn how to utilize this tool to identify areas that require attention and create a balanced and fulfilling life.


Productivity Pyramid

The Productivity Pyramid provides a structured approach to personal productivity, enabling individuals to prioritize tasks and focus their efforts on high-value activities. T


Values

Understanding one's core values is crucial for aligning personal and professional goals and making decisions that are in harmony with one's true self. Participants will explore their values and learn how to incorporate them into their daily lives to enhance motivation, drive, and overall productivity.


Values Detaily

Delving deeper into the concept of values, participants will learn how to define their values in detail. By understanding their values at a granular level, individuals can make intentional choices that are in line with their authentic selves, leading to increased satisfaction and productivity.


Understanding Burnout

Burnout is a prevalent issue in today's high-pressure work environments, and it can significantly impact both career progression and personal well-being. This module will delve into the causes and symptoms of burnout, as well as strategies to prevent and overcome it. Key topics include:


7 Reasons for Burnout

Participants will gain insights into the seven common causes of burnout, such as excessive workload, lack of control, insufficient support, and conflicting values. Understanding these factors is crucial for identifying and mitigating burnout risks.


Burnout Syndrome

Participants will explore the physical, emotional, and psychological effects of burnout syndrome. They will learn to recognize the warning signs and implement effective strategies to restore well-being and productivity.


Navigating VUCA (Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity, Ambiguity)

In today's rapidly changing business landscape, individuals need to be equipped with the skills and mindset to navigate VUCA situations effectively. This module will provide participants with the necessary tools to thrive amidst volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity.


VUCA Concept

Participants will understand the VUCA framework and its implications in personal and professional contexts. They will learn strategies to manage ambiguity, embrace change, and make informed decisions in dynamic environments.


Henry Ford Theory

Henry Ford's Theory of Productivity emphasizes the importance of efficient processes and time management. Participants will explore Ford's principles and learn how to streamline their workflow, eliminate wasteful activities, and maximize productivity.


Flexibility and Adaptability

In an ever-changing world, being flexible and adaptable is vital for personal and professional growth. This module will focus on developing the mindset and skills necessary to embrace change and thrive in diverse environments.


Developing Flexibility

Participants will learn techniques to develop adaptability, resilience, and agility. They will explore strategies for embracing change, overcoming resistance, and seeking opportunities for personal and professional growth.


Practical Tasks

Throughout the course, participants will engage in five practical tasks aimed at applying the concepts learned. These tasks will challenge participants to integrate productivity techniques into their daily lives, providing opportunities for reflection, feedback, and improvement.


Importance of Learning and Training Personal Productivity for Career and Happiness:

Learning and training personal productivity skills are of paramount importance for individuals seeking career success and personal happiness. Here's why:


Career Success:

Effective time management, goal setting, and self-management skills are fundamental to career advancement and productivity. By learning to prioritize tasks, set clear goals, and manage their time efficiently, individuals can maximize their productivity and achieve professional success. Additionally, developing strong management skills and leadership qualities through personal productivity training allows individuals to effectively lead teams, solve problems, and drive organizational success.


Personal Happiness:

Personal productivity training goes beyond professional success and extends to personal fulfillment and happiness. By optimizing their time and resources, individuals can create a better work-life balance, nurturing their relationships, pursuing personal passions, and prioritizing self-care. Personal productivity skills also foster a positive mindset, resilience, and adaptability, enabling individuals to navigate challenges, manage stress, and maintain overall well-being.


By equipping themselves with management skills, leadership qualities, and a strong foundation in personal productivity, individuals can unlock their full potential, achieve their goals, and lead fulfilling lives. This course serves as a transformative journey towards personal and professional growth, combining the principles of time management, goal setting, and self-development with the principles of happiness, positive psychology, and mindset optimization.
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to develop personal productivity and management skills

The Personal Productivity course provides a comprehensive overview of essential skills and concepts to enhance individual effectiveness and efficiency in various aspects of life. Through a combination of theoretical frameworks and practical exercises, participants will gain valuable insights and tools to optimize their personal productivity and achieve their goals. This course covers a range of topics, including:

Introduction to Personal Productivity: This module introduces the fundamental principles and benefits of personal productivity, emphasizing the importance of self-management and goal-oriented behavior.
Ying Yang Concept: Explore the concept of balance and harmony in personal productivity, learning how to strike a healthy equilibrium between work and personal life.

Lecture Balance Wheel: Understand the concept of the Balance Wheel, a powerful visual tool for assessing and improving different areas of life, such as career, health, relationships, and personal growth.
Productivity Pyramid: Discover the Productivity Pyramid framework, which helps individuals prioritize tasks, manage time effectively, and optimize workflow.
Values and Values Detailing: Identify personal values and learn how aligning actions with core values can enhance motivation, decision-making, and overall satisfaction.
Reasons of Burnout and Burnout Syndrome: Recognize the warning signs and causes of burnout, and explore strategies for preventing and overcoming this common productivity obstacle.
VUCA Concept: Understand the VUCA (Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity, Ambiguity) concept and develop resilience and adaptability skills to thrive in rapidly changing environments.
Henry Ford Theory: Learn from Henry Ford's principles of efficiency and productivity, discovering ways to streamline processes and optimize resource utilization.
Flexibility: Gain insights into the importance of flexibility and adaptability in personal productivity, exploring strategies for effectively managing change and unexpected circumstances.
The course also includes five practical tasks that allow participants to apply the concepts learned to real-life scenarios, fostering a deeper understanding and practical skill development.
How Learning Personal Productivity Skills Can Benefit Career, Business, and Personal Development:

Mastering personal productivity skills has a profound impact on various aspects of professional and personal life. By honing these skills, participants can enhance their management and leadership capabilities, drive business success, and achieve personal development goals. Some of the key benefits include:

Management Skills and Leadership: Personal productivity skills equip individuals with effective time management, task prioritization, and goal-setting techniques, enabling them to lead and manage teams more efficiently.

Business Management and CEO Success: Improved personal productivity directly translates into better business management, enabling CEOs and business leaders to optimize processes, drive productivity gains, and achieve organizational goals.

People Management and Team Management: With enhanced personal productivity skills, managers can effectively manage and delegate tasks, empower their teams, and foster a more productive work environment.

Goal Setting and OKR (Objectives and Key Results): Personal productivity skills help individuals set clear and actionable goals, align their efforts, and track progress using the OKR methodology, driving personal success and organizational growth.

Mindset and Subconscious Mind: Personal productivity training enhances self-awareness, cultivates a growth mindset, and taps into the power of the subconscious mind to overcome obstacles and unlock hidden potential.
Task Management and Overwhelm: By mastering task management techniques, individuals can reduce overwhelm, increase focus, and accomplish more in less time.

Happiness and Positive Psychology: Effective personal productivity practices enhance well-being and happiness by reducing stress, improving work-life balance, and promoting positive psychology principles.

Personality Development and Personal Development: Personal productivity skills contribute to overall personality development by fostering discipline, resilience, and continuous learning, leading to personal growth and self-improvement.

Mindfulness and Coaching: Personal productivity training often incorporates mindfulness techniques, promoting present-moment awareness, stress reduction, and enhanced focus. Additionally, coaching methodologies can provide individual support and guidance throughout the personal productivity journey.

Personal Transformation: Mastering personal productivity skills can lead to transformative changes in all areas of life, empowering individuals to achieve their full potential and experience personal transformation.
Join the Personal Productivity course and unlock the tools and knowledge to optimize your performance, achieve your goals, and lead a more fulfilling and productive life.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Operations Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Program in Operations Management, Operation Leadership, Management Skills, Process Building
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Operations Management

Program provided by MTF Institute

You will know about: what is operational management and why is it important; what kind of methods, approaches and systems OM has, what is risk in OM; how to forecast and plan in OM; tasks and types of OM; what are the Kanban, Poka Yoke, Toyota Production System, Lean management, Six sigma, Conveyor system and Economies of scope


After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about operational and production management, how to manage systems in operational management and how to use it effectively and convenient


Course Plan:

1. About the course, topic and author

2. Operational management and its history, forms and methods of production management

3. Tasks and types of operational management, development of production plan

4. Forecasting and planning

5. Control and quality systems

6. Operational risk management

7. Methods and approaches

8. Economies of scope

9. Kanban and Poka Yoke


This online course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads, etc.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge, types, methods, principles of operational management. Also, here you can find and get to know important systems and approaches, such as Lean management, Six Sigma, Toyota Production System and other interesting topics. In addition, you will learn different instruments and methods to manage production management.


Course Full Description

The Executive Diploma in Operations Management is designed to provide professionals with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the field of operations management. This comprehensive course covers key concepts, strategies, and tools used in managing and optimizing business operations. From planning and forecasting to risk management and quality control, participants will gain a deep understanding of the principles and practices that drive operational excellence. The course also explores the role of operations management in leadership, management consulting, and career advancement. Whether you're an aspiring manager, a seasoned professional, or an MBA candidate, this course will equip you with the essential skills needed to thrive in the dynamic world of operations management.


Introduction to Operations Management

  • Understanding the role of operations management in organizations

  • Key concepts, theories, and frameworks in operations management

  • Aligning operations strategy with business objectives

  • The impact of operations management on overall organizational performance


Planning, Forecasting, Controlling, and Quality

  • Strategic planning and tactical decision-making in operations management

  • Demand forecasting techniques and their application

  • Quality management principles, tools, and techniques


Risk Management

  • Identifying and assessing risks in operations

  • Developing risk mitigation strategies


Methods and Approaches

  • Business process reengineering and optimization techniques


Economy of Scope and Scale

  • Understanding economies of scale and scope in operations

  • Cost reduction strategies and efficiency improvements


Tools Examples: Kanban

  • Introduction to Kanban as a visual management tool


Tools Examples: Poka Yoke

  • Understanding Poka Yoke (mistake-proofing) concepts


Importance of Operations Management in Career Building:

Operations management plays a vital role in building a successful career in various fields, including leadership, management, MBA preparation, management consulting, and more. Here are some key reasons why a strong foundation in operations management is crucial for career growth:


  1. Leadership and Management Skills: Operations management equips professionals with essential leadership and management skills. It teaches individuals how to plan, organize, and control resources efficiently, making them effective leaders and managers in any organizational setting.

  2. Business Fundamentals: Operations management provides a deep understanding of the fundamental principles that drive business operations. This knowledge is invaluable for professionals seeking to make strategic decisions, optimize processes, and drive overall business performance.

  3. Project Management: Operations management encompasses project management principles and techniques. By mastering these skills, professionals can successfully execute projects, meet deadlines, manage resources, and deliver high-quality results, making them valuable assets to any organization.

  4. MBA Preparation: For individuals considering pursuing an MBA or other advanced management degrees, a strong foundation in operations management is essential. It provides the necessary knowledge and skills required for success in MBA programs and enhances career prospects in various industries.

  5. Management Consulting: Operations management expertise is highly sought after in the field of management consulting. Professionals with a deep understanding of operations can assist organizations in improving efficiency, reducing costs, and enhancing overall performance, making them valuable consultants to businesses.

The Executive Diploma in Operations Management offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers essential topics and tools required to excel in the field of operations management. By developing a strong understanding of operations management principles and practices, participants will be well-equipped to make strategic decisions, optimize processes, and drive operational excellence in their organizations. Whether you aspire to be a leader, enhance your management skills, pursue an MBA, or excel in management consulting, this course will provide you with the necessary knowledge and skills to achieve your career goals.
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to build a career at management, business and entrepreneurship.

courseDetails.title: Revit- Mass Modeling- From Zero to Complex Shapes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Conceptual Mass- Complex Forms with Massing in Revit and Parametric Design- Facades, Towers and Various Surfaces
courseDetails.longDescription:
Note: The main difference in this course compared to others is that we have not confined ourselves to explaining simple techniques. Instead, we have conveyed the subject through challenging projects and specific tricks, which are the result of numerous experiences.


  • Do you think Revit cannot model any form?

  • Have you encountered patterns and shapes in your projects but didn't know how to model them in Revit?

  • Are you interested in organic and free-form designs and frequently use them in your designs?

In this course, we first explain the principles of modeling in Revit and its differences from the project environment. We quickly move on to creating form-based surfaces and learn the basic concepts of modeling in Revit through several examples. Then, we delve into complex forms, and I can say that together we will create any form that you thought might be impossible to model in Revit and practice it.

Next, we will explore the fascinating topic of parametric modeling. We will model various diverse projects and share numerous tricks with you. To make this course shine, I have also provided examples of openable, closable, and animated forms for you to enjoy.


Some of the topics covered in this course include:

  • Explanation of MASS and its applications

  • Modeling techniques in MASS

  • Explanation of options, such as 3D Snapping

  • Difference between Ref Line and Model Line

  • Explanation of Mass in Place

  • Explanation of Mass Study (also known as Mass Overlay)

  • Importing complex volumes from 3DS Max and Rhino

  • Explanation of various patterns and their modeling techniques

  • Parameterizing patterns and Surfaces

  • Modeling openable, closable, and animated structures

If you are currently a BIM modeler or planning to become one, it is essential not to limit yourself to any form. You should be able to manage any architectural design in the BIM process And in the end, you will be the hero of this training. Please watch this course and feel free to ask me any questions you have while watching it. Additionally, during the learning BIM Process, ask me questions so that I can guide you.
targetAudiences: 3D Modeler
BIM Modeler
Architects
BIM Coordinators
BIM Managers
Expert 3D Modelers

courseDetails.title: Learn Thai with Thai-English Interpreter ( Native Thai)
courseDetails.shortDescription: by a Native Thai
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is designed to be practical and offers the most effective and easiest way to learn the Thai language. It is suitable for anyone who wants to learn Thai, especially those who are planning to visit Thailand but have not had the time or inclination to learn its language. This course aims to assist you in this regard.


Please note that you are not required to follow the content in a strict linear manner. Feel free to jump from one chapter to another as you see fit. If you are preparing for a short trip to Thailand, you might want to focus on sentences for expressions and conversations. Once you arrive in Thailand, simply speaking the language will make the rest of the course feel like a leisure activity.


For those seeking a deeper understanding of the language, the other chapters are recommended. Specifically, if you are aiming for a long-term mastery of Thai, learning about Thai Consonants, Thai Vowels, and Thai Tone Markers is crucial. You can observe how to write them by watching the hand movements on the website provided.


With appreciation,

Winai


Requirements:

• If you want to learn to speak Thai for personal reasons (e.g., your Thai partner), this course is for you.

courseDetails.title: T-Shirt Design for Beginner to Expert With Photoshop
courseDetails.shortDescription: Create Eye-Catching T-Shirt Designs with Photoshop: From Beginner to Pro
courseDetails.longDescription:
This comprehensive T-shirt design course will transform you from a complete beginner to a confident expert in creating eye-catching and professional T-shirt designs using Adobe Photoshop. Whether you're passionate about fashion, have a knack for creativity, or simply want to learn a valuable skill, this course will equip you with the knowledge and tools to turn your ideas into stunning T-shirt designs that are ready for production.

What You'll Learn

  • Master the Fundamentals of Photoshop: Gain a solid understanding of the essential tools, features, and techniques of Adobe Photoshop, the industry-standard software for creating and editing digital images.

  • Explore T-Shirt Design Principles: Delve into the principles of effective T-shirt design, from conceptualizing ideas and sketching layouts to selecting colors, fonts, and graphics that resonate with your target audience.

  • Create Captivating T-Shirt Designs: Learn how to utilize Photoshop's powerful tools to create a variety of T-shirt designs, including text-based designs, graphic designs, and photo-based designs.

  • Master Advanced T-Shirt Design Techniques: Elevate your skills with advanced techniques such as image manipulation, layer masking, blending modes, and non-destructive editing workflows.

  • Prepare Your Designs for Production: Discover how to export your designs in the correct format and resolution for various printing methods, ensuring your designs look their best on printed T-shirts.

Course Requirements

This course is designed for individuals with a basic understanding of computers and an interest in T-shirt design. No prior Photoshop experience is required.

Who Should Take This Course

  • Beginners eager to learn the art of T-shirt design with Adobe Photoshop

  • Aspiring T-shirt designers seeking to build a portfolio of professional-looking designs

  • Entrepreneurs looking to create and sell their own custom T-shirt designs

  • Anyone interested in expressing their creativity and turning their ideas into tangible products

Course Structure

The course is structured around a series of in-depth modules, each covering a specific aspect of T-shirt design and Photoshop usage. Each module includes a combination of video lectures, hands-on exercises, and practical projects to reinforce your learning and ensure you gain hands-on experience applying the concepts.

Course Benefits

  • Develop essential T-shirt design skills and techniques

  • Create a portfolio of professional-looking T-shirt designs

  • Gain the ability to design and produce your own custom T-shirts

  • Enhance your career prospects in the T-shirt design industry

Enroll today and unleash your creativity to design T-shirts that make a statement!
targetAudiences: Beginners eager to learn the art of T-shirt design with Adobe Photoshop
Aspiring T-shirt designers seeking to build a portfolio of professional-looking designs
Entrepreneurs looking to create and sell their own custom T-shirt designs

Comprehensive Learning, Step by Step:

This comprehensive Udemy course is designed to guide you through the process of creating compelling high-contrast posters and thumbnails. Whether you're a beginner with a passion for design or an experienced professional looking to enhance your skill set, this course caters to all levels of expertise.


By the end of this journey, you'll confidently design high-contrast posters/thumbnails that demand attention. Unlock your potential as a graphic designer and enroll now. Let's transform your creative ideas into visually stunning realities!

courseDetails.title: Python per l'apprendimento profondo: Costruire reti neurali
courseDetails.shortDescription: Corso completo sul Deep Learning per padroneggiare scienza dei dati, Tensorflow, intelligenza artificiale e reti neurali
courseDetails.longDescription:
Python è famoso come uno dei migliori linguaggi di programmazione per la sua flessibilità. Funziona in quasi tutti i campi, dallo sviluppo web allo sviluppo di applicazioni finanziarie. Tuttavia, non è un segreto che la migliore applicazione di Python sia l'apprendimento profondo e l'intelligenza artificiale.

Sebbene Python renda facile l'apprendimento profondo, sarà comunque piuttosto frustrante per chi non sa come funziona l'apprendimento automatico.

Se conoscete le basi di Python e siete appassionati di deep learning, questo corso è pensato per voi. Questo corso vi aiuterà a imparare a creare programmi che prendono in input i dati e automatizzano l'estrazione delle caratteristiche, semplificando le attività del mondo reale per gli esseri umani.

Su Internet sono disponibili centinaia di risorse per l'apprendimento automatico. Tuttavia, se non si filtra ciò che si impara, si rischia di apprendere lezioni inutili. Nel creare questo corso, ci siamo aiutati a filtrare per isolare le nozioni di base essenziali di cui avrete bisogno nel vostro percorso di deep learning.

Si tratta di un corso di base che è ideale sia per i principianti che per gli esperti. Se siete alla ricerca di un corso che parta dalle basi per arrivare agli argomenti avanzati, questo è il corso migliore per voi.

Insegna solo ciò che è necessario per iniziare a studiare l'apprendimento profondo, senza inutili fronzoli. Sebbene ciò contribuisca a mantenere il corso piuttosto conciso, si tratta di tutto ciò di cui si ha bisogno per iniziare l'argomento.
targetAudiences: Programmatori che desiderano aggiungere il deep learning alle loro competenze
Matematici professionisti che vogliono imparare ad analizzare i dati in modo programmatico
Tutti gli appassionati di programmazione Python che desiderano aggiungere al proprio portafoglio competenze in materia di deep learning

courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Technical Drawing with Orthographic & Isometric Projections, Engineering curves, Projection of Solids and DLS
courseDetails.longDescription:
"Engineering Drawing / Graphics: Hands-on Training" is a comprehensive course designed to teach the fundamentals of technical drawing and graphics to first-year engineering students, first-year polytechnic/diploma students, and 12th science students. In this course, students will learn how to create accurate technical drawings with orthographic and isometric projections, as well as gain an understanding of engineering curves, projection of solids, and development of lateral surfaces.

The instructor will provide step-by-step guidance on how to draw using actual instruments of drawing, making it easy for learners to follow along. By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation in engineering drawing and graphics, and will be able to draw a variety of technical designs with confidence.

This hands-on training course is perfect for beginners and professionals looking to improve their skills. The course includes practical skills and real-world applications that are essential for anyone looking to build a career in engineering or related fields.

In this course, students will explore a wide range of topics in engineering drawing and graphics. The course is designed to be interactive and engaging, with a focus on practical skills that can be applied in the real world.

Whether you're looking to enhance your skills or just starting out, this course is the perfect way to learn the fundamentals of technical drawing and graphics. With expert guidance and hands-on training, you'll gain the knowledge and confidence you need to create accurate technical drawings and designs.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Business Administration
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Program in Management, Leadership, Business Administration, Project Management for CEO / C-level
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Executive Program in Business Administration


You will know about: business administration, its functions and focuses; how to manage material flows and human resources; what is organizational structure, its types and how to synchronize different departments; what is project management and its methods; setting goals and planning in organizations; what is ethic in business; logistic and its characteristics; how to develop organization


After finishing a course you will get: basic knowledge about business administration and, mainly, how to manage company, its processes at different levels


Course Plan:

1. About the course, topic and author

2. Administrative management and the essence of Business Administration

3. Management of material and human resources

4. Organizational structure and synchronization of departments

5. Project management

6. Setting goals and planning in enterprise

7. Ethics of business

8. Business logistics

9. Organizational development management


Course Authors:

Igor Dmitriev

Education: I. MBA, The Boston University, USA, II. Master of Science at Engineering (Technical) Management, The State University of New York at Buffalo, USA, III. Six Sigma Black Belt

Expert at Banking (>16 years), FinTech & Digital (>12 years), Experienced Manager (>12 years) with successful track of records at personal and corporate entrepreneurship

More than 12 years at worldwide banking groups such us Societe Generale, Raiffeisenbank

Experience at roles: CEO, Head of Business, Chief Digital & Marketing Officer, Head of Digital Transformation and Channels, Head of Products and Marketing


Zhansaya Berdikulova

Education: Master of Economic Sciences of M. Auezov South Kazakhstan University.
Experience: Regional Coordinator of the leadership development projects, certified coach,
coach for the development of leadership qualities.


Course Full Description and Welcome Letter: Executive Program in Business Administration

This course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads of departments, etc. The course could help to improve your managerial skills and also to create annual company plan, budgets and effectively set organizational goals.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge and instruments of administrative management or business administration. Also, here you can find interesting tools and, for example, different types of organizational structures.


All this information will help you to gain more confidence in your position as a manager or CEO.


The Executive Program in Business Administration is a comprehensive and intensive course designed to equip professionals with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective administrative management in a business environment. This program covers a wide range of topics that are crucial for individuals aspiring to build successful careers or establish their own businesses.


Administrative Management: This topic explores the fundamental principles and practices of administrative management, including decision-making, problem-solving, and effective communication within an organization. Participants learn how to streamline processes, improve productivity, and foster a positive work culture.


The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.


Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.


Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.


Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.


Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.


Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.


Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.


Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:


Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:


Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.


Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.


Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.


Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.


Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.


Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.


Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.


Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.


In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.


Linked topics:

  • MBA

  • Business Fundamentals

  • Business Strategy

  • Management

  • Business Management

  • Leadership

  • Business Administration

  • MBA Master Degree preparation

  • CEO

  • Chief Executive Officer
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to build a career at management, business and entrepreneurship.

courseDetails.title: सीखें WordPress हिन्दी में
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn WordPress step by step to make beautiful websites in हिन्दी Language.
courseDetails.longDescription:
आपका स्वागत है आखिरी WordPress कोर्स में! यह कोर्स आपको WordPress के सभी मूल और मौलिक अवधारणाओं को सिखाने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है, और सिर्फ़ ब्लॉगिंग साइट बल्कि व्यापारिक वेबसाइट को शून्य से बनाने के तरीके को सीखने के लिए।

हम पहले WordPress इंटरफ़ेस और उसके विभिन्न घटकों की खोज करेंगे, और फिर ब्लॉगिंग साइट बनाने के महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताओं में प्रवेश करेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि लोकलहोस्ट पर WordPress को कैसे स्थापित और सेटअप करें, सामग्री बनाएं और प्रबंधित करें, और अपनी साइट को सर्च इंजन के लिए अनुकूलित कैसे करें।

अगले, हम WordPress का उपयोग करके व्यापारिक वेबसाइट बनाने के तरीकों पर आगे बढ़ेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि कैसे एक थीम का चयन करें और कस्टमाइज़ करें, पेज, मेनू, और साइडबार बनाएं, और संपर्क फॉर्म्स और सोशल मीडिया जैसे आवश्यक व्यापारिक सुविधाओं को कैसे शामिल करें।

हम यह भी कवर करेंगे कि अपनी साइट को लोकलहोस्ट से ऑनलाइन सर्वर पर कैसे माइग्रेट किया जाए। आप सीखेंगे कि अपनी WordPress साइट को बैकअप और रिस्टोर कैसे करें, अपनी फ़ाइल्स और डेटाबेस को कैसे ट्रांसफ़र करें, और सामान्य माइग्रेशन की सामान्य दिक्कतों से कैसे बचा जा सकता है।

इसके अलावा, हम डोमेन और होस्टिंग सेटअप प्रक्रिया की भी जाँच करेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि सही डोमेन और होस्टिंग प्रदाता का चयन कैसे करें, अपने डोमेन और होस्टिंग को कैसे सेटअप करें, और अपनी साइट को एक होस्टिंग प्रदाता से दूसरे होस्टिंग प्रदाता में कैसे माइग्रेट करें।

इस कोर्स का सबसे अच्छा हिस्सा यह है कि हम अपने छात्रों के अनुरोधों के आधार पर समय-समय पर नए व्याख्यान जोड़ते हैं। हम चाहते हैं कि आपको WordPress के बारे में नवीनतम और सबसे मूल्यवान जानकारी तक पहुँच मिले।

और, मैं व्यक्तिगत रूप से छात्रों के सभी प्रश्नों का उत्तर देता हूँ। इसलिए, अगर आपके पास कोई प्रश्न या चिंता है, तो हमसे पूछने

Anyone who wants to create Websites, Blogs and E-Commerce sites with Ease.

What is Adobe Lightroom Classic and how does it differ from normal Lightroom?

It's VERY important that you don't get confused by the two! Lightroom Classic, covered in this course, is a program that is used by photographers to view, sort, process and export their images for use elsewhere. Normal Lightroom is a cloud-based sharing program that then shares those exported files (or any other photos for that matter), between your devices - your computer, tablet and smartphone. Normal Lightroom is not covered in this course.

• Interface and Import

courseDetails.title: Adeus Windows! Curso Completo de Linux Desktop —Iniciantes—
courseDetails.shortDescription: Sobre: Segurança, Performance, FHS, Principais Comandos, ufw Firewall, Oracle VirtualBox, Flatpak, Estilizar o Linux =)
courseDetails.longDescription:
O que é Linux?

Assim como o Windows, iOS e MacOS, o Linux é um sistema operacional. De fato, uma das plataformas mais populares do planeta, por exemplo, o Android é um sistema operacional Linux usado em celulares, mas também há versões para desktop (ensinada neste curso), servidores e outros dispositivos. Atualmente (2023) são mais de 600 opções de Linux que você pode escolher.

Por que devo aprender Linux?

Diferentemente do Windows, você não precisa ter um PC caro para rodar novas versões Linux, um computador com menos de 1GB de RAM pode rodar satisfatoriamente um navegador de internet e uma planilha compatível com Excel, por exemplo. A grande questão é que os bons sistemas Linux são rápidos, seguros e gratuitos!

Quem usa o Linux?

  • 47% dos desenvolvedores profissionais usam sistemas operacionais baseados em Linux. (Statista)

  • O Linux alimenta 39,2% dos sites cujo sistema operacional é conhecido. (W3Techs)

  • O Linux alimenta 85% dos smartphones. (Hayden James)

  • Linux é o terceiro sistema operacional de desktop mais popular, dentre eles, é o único totalmente gratuito. (Statista)

  • Os 500 supercomputadores mais rápidos do mundo são executados no Linux, pois são mais confiáveis. (Blackdown)

  • 96,3% dos servidores que custam mais de US$ 1.000.000,00 (um milhão de dólares) estão executando Linux. (ZDNet)

O que aprenderei nesse curso?

Este curso foi criado para que usuários de Windows possam migrar para Linux. Para isso, será usado um processo (passo a passo) que facilitará sua adaptação no Linux, mesmo sem conhecimentos avançados no novo sistema operacional.

O que este curso tem de diferente dos demais?

Este não é apenas um curso de “como usar Linux”, é um processo estruturado de forma que você vai se adaptar ao novo sistema. Este treinamento foi desenhado para você usar o Linux no seu dia a dia, aproveitar os benefícios da tecnologia, mas sem exigir que você domine completamente os comandos Linux, pois permite uma adaptação gradual ao novo sistema.

Obs.: Usuários que já tentaram usar Linux, se frustraram e acabaram voltando para Windows, fiquem tranquilos, dessa vez você vai conseguir! =)

Como são as aulas?

O treinamento é composto por 80% de aulas práticas, passo a passo. As aulas teóricas representam 20% do curso, onde são explicados conceitos importantes para novos usuários de Linux.

Este curso me tornará um administrador de Linux?

Não. Este curso tem foco no usuário Desktop e não na formação de um administrador Linux, mas é um caminho inicial ideal para quem deseja tornar futuramente. Um administrador Linux precisa de um grande conhecimento sobre serviços, protocolos de rede, gerenciamento diversos tipos de acessos, entre outras operações avançadas, estas tarefas não são o foco deste treinamento.

O que é um terminal Linux? Vou aprender a usar?

Terminal (ou shell) é um software onde você digita comandos para executar as tarefas sem precisar usar mouse, botões e janelas. Sendo um curso de Linux, obviamente, será ensinado sobre a Estrutura de Arquivos Linux (FHS) e, execução de comandos essenciais no terminal.

Como é a interface gráfica do Linux usado neste curso?

Usaremos o Linux Ubuntu, que é uma das distribuições Linux mais estáveis e confiáveis do universo Linux, o Ubuntu possui imensa quantidade de recursos operacionais gráficos, que permite a um usuário de Windows se adaptar com facilidade ao novo sistema.

Vou aprender coisas avançadas neste curso?

Neste treinamento você também vai entender e praticar assuntos avançados como Virtualização em Linux, aprendendo o conceito, instalação e configuração de máquinas virtuais no Linux Ubuntu, utilizaremos o poderoso Oracle VirtualBox neste processo.

O que preciso saber antes de fazer este curso?

Estar habituado ao uso de Windows ou outro sistema operacional como macOS já é o bastante.

Quem é o professor?

Prof. Arnaldo Sousa, formado em Engenharia de Software e apaixonado pesquisas tecnológicas. Foi instrutor oficial IBM e Sun Microsystem (criadora do Java, atual Oracle), é professor licenciado, especializado em docência, neuroaprendizagem e educação especial. Com larga experiência de uso e ensino de novas tecnologias em grandes corporações, o professor vai lhe apresentar o Linux de uma forma extremamente compreensível!
targetAudiences: Iniciantes em Linux;
Usuários de Windows ou macOS;
Aqueles que desejam facilidade de uso, segurança e performance Linux, mas não querem aprofundar-se nos comandos de terminal;
Pessoas que gostariam de migrar de Windows para Linux mas tem medo de não conseguir;
Aqueles que desejam usar o Linux como Desktop/Workstation;
Pessoas que já tentaram e não conseguiram usar o Linux como sistema operacional no dia a dia.

courseDetails.title: Komplett NFT-Kurs: Werden Sie ein NFT-Ersteller und-Investor

courseDetails.longDescription:
Seit Bitcoin die meisten Menschen in den letzten Jahren gezwungen hat, sich mit Kryptowährungen zu beschäftigen, hat keine andere Technologie so viel Aufmerksamkeit erregt wie NFTs. Sie basieren auf der gleichen Blockchain-Technologie wie die meisten Kryptowährungen, sind also wie Kryptowährungen, nur mit einem anderen Zweck.

Dieser Kurs zeigt Ihnen, wie NFTs funktionieren und wie sie mit der Blockchain-Technologie zusammenhängen. Sie lernen den theoretischen Aspekt der neuen Technologie kennen und erfahren, welche Funktion sie im realen Leben hat. Dieser Kurs ist ein All-in-One-Leitfaden, der sowohl für Amateure als auch für Profis geeignet ist.

Um das Verständnis des Kurses zu erleichtern, ist er in mehrere Unterabschnitte unterteilt. Dies soll sowohl Anfängern als auch Experten helfen, sich während des Kurses besser zurechtzufinden.

Wenn Sie zum ersten Mal von nicht-fungiblen Token hören, empfehle ich Ihnen, der Gliederung des Kurses zu folgen. Sie wird Ihnen helfen, sich in der ohnehin schon verwirrenden Welt der nicht-fungiblen Token zurechtzufinden. Die Lernressourcen enthalten auch Empfehlungen von Websites und Software, die Ihnen den Einstieg erleichtern.

Obwohl Sie NFTs auch ohne eine entsprechende Ausbildung problemlos prägen, kaufen und verkaufen können, ist es wichtig, dass Sie wissen, womit Sie es zu tun haben. Auf diese Weise wird es einfacher, andere Menschen in die Welt der NFTs einzuladen, da Sie wissen, was Sie ihnen erzählen können, um ihr Interesse zu wecken.
targetAudiences: Berufstätige oder Studenten, die sich in den Bereich der nichtfälschbaren Münzen einarbeiten und die Wissenschaft dahinter kennenlernen möchten
Künstler, die davon träumen, ihre Kunst als NFT anzubieten, und die Möglichkeiten und Optionen ausloten möchten

Alle, die mehr über die besten Methoden zum Erstellen, Sammeln und Verkaufen von NFTs erfahren möchten

Diese Anleitung ist perfekt für Sie, wenn Sie keine Vorkenntnisse in HTML, CSS, JavaScript oder PHP haben und einen schönen Blog mit minimalem Aufwand erstellen möchten.


Das ultimative WordPress-Tutorial für Einsteiger!

Time management is essential for the growth and success of any individual. The majority of the world's billionaires or successful people have excellent time management skills. They use their limited time so productively that the rest of the population finds it hard to emulate.

Good time management skills aren't about the amount of time available to implement a task. It's about making the little time you have to be as productive as possible.

If you are desperate to improve your time management skills, you are in the right place. This course will teach you how to multiply your time through outsourcing and deep work. If you’ve previously tried ineffective time management courses, this offers a break from that. We'll not only teach you about time management but also about "Joining the New Rich" as well. Do you wish there was a shortcut to writing well?

Well, thankfully, there is.

And you'll find it here in A Crash Course in Writing Well, ex-Wall Street Journal editor Shani Raja's latest bestselling Udemy course.

The program is designed to put you on the fast track to becoming an all-round better writer—whether you mainly write college essays, business emails, government reports, academic research papers, blog posts, press releases, news articles, website scripts, social-media content or online-marketing copy.

Here, Shani teaches the key principles of good writing using examples from drawn various contexts, with the emphasis on taking you to the top of the learning curve of exceptional writing quickly.

The course is ideal for busy people yearning to improve their writing but who lack the time to sit through long, in-depth programs on writing or editing.

In addition to editing for the Wall Street Journal, Shani's journalism experience includes writing for The Economist, the FT and Bloomberg News. So far, his courses on writing and editing have attracted more than a million students from more than 200 countries, and he has previously been rated as among the top 10% of most engaging Udemy instructors.

Maximum learning in minimum time

The Procurement Expert certification is a valuable credential for professionals working in the field of procurement and supply chain management. This certification signifies a high level of expertise and knowledge in various aspects of procurement, including strategic sourcing, supplier management, contract negotiation, and cost optimization. Obtaining this certification can have significant benefits for both employees and companies alike.


For employees, the Procurement Expert certification offers several advantages. Firstly, it enhances their credibility and marketability in the job market. Employers value certified professionals who have demonstrated a deep understanding of procurement principles and practices, making certified individuals more competitive in the industry. This certification serves as tangible proof of their expertise and commitment to professional development, giving them an edge over non-certified candidates during job interviews and advancement opportunities.


Secondly, the Procurement Expert certification provides individuals with comprehensive knowledge and skills necessary to excel in their roles. It equips them with a solid foundation in procurement strategies, risk management, supplier evaluation, and contract management. This knowledge enables professionals to make informed decisions, mitigate risks, negotiate favorable terms with suppliers, and drive cost savings for their organizations. As a result, certified procurement experts are better equipped to contribute to their company's success and add value to their organization's bottom line.


Moreover, the Procurement Expert certification helps professionals stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices. The certification program typically requires candidates to engage in continuous learning and professional development, ensuring that they remain well-informed about advancements in procurement methodologies, technology solutions, and regulatory compliance. This ongoing learning process enables professionals to stay ahead of the curve, adapt to changing market conditions, and identify innovative approaches to improve their organization's procurement processes.


From the perspective of companies, hiring employees with a Procurement Expert certification brings numerous benefits. These certified professionals possess a deep understanding of procurement principles, which enables them to streamline procurement processes, identify cost-saving opportunities, and optimize supplier relationships. Their expertise helps companies minimize risks, ensure compliance, and achieve greater operational efficiency in their procurement operations.


Furthermore, certified procurement experts can contribute to strategic decision-making within their organizations. With their knowledge of market trends, supplier capabilities, and cost structures, they can provide valuable insights and recommendations that align with the company's overall business objectives. Their ability to identify and leverage strategic sourcing opportunities can lead to improved supplier performance, reduced costs, and increased profitability.


In terms of career building, a strong foundation in procurement is highly beneficial. Procurement professionals are in high demand across various industries, as organizations recognize the critical role procurement plays in achieving operational excellence and competitiveness. By obtaining the Procurement Expert certification, individuals gain a competitive advantage in the job market, opening doors to rewarding career opportunities and higher earning potential. With the certification, professionals can pursue roles such as Procurement Manager, Strategic Sourcing Analyst, Category Manager, or Supply Chain Consultant, among others.


The Procurement Expert certification holds great importance for both employees and companies. For individuals, it establishes their credibility, enhances their knowledge and skills, and boosts their career prospects in the field of procurement. For companies, hiring certified procurement experts ensures access to professionals with a strong foundation in procurement principles, strategic thinking, and value creation. This certification serves as a testament to an individual's commitment to excellence in the procurement field and brings tangible benefits to both professionals and the organizations they serve.

Sample Question:

A company wants to review its monthly costs of using Amazon EC2 and Amazon RDS for the past year.

Which AWS service or tool provides this information?

A. AWS Trusted Advisor

B. Cost Explorer

C. Amazon Forecast

D. Amazon CloudWatch

Scroll below for the answer.

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

   |

  \/

  \/

  \/

  \/

  \/

    |

\\_//

Answer: The AWS service that provides information about the monthly costs of using Amazon EC2 and Amazon RDS for the past year is:


B. Cost Explorer

Explanation:

AWS Cost Explorer is a service that allows you to visualize and understand your AWS cost and usage over time. It provides various features and tools for analyzing your AWS spending, including the ability to view historical cost and usage data, identify trends, create custom cost reports, and forecast future costs. This service can help you review your monthly costs for various AWS resources, including EC2 and RDS instances, and make informed decisions about your AWS spending.

Why other options are not correct?


Let's briefly discuss why the other options are not the most appropriate for reviewing the monthly costs of using Amazon EC2 and Amazon RDS for the past year:

A. AWS Trusted Advisor:

  • AWS Trusted Advisor is a service that provides recommendations to optimize your AWS environment for cost savings, security, performance, and fault tolerance.

  • While it can offer cost-saving recommendations, it doesn't provide historical cost data or the ability to review past costs over a year.

C. Amazon Forecast:

  • Amazon Forecast is a service for time-series forecasting and predicting future data trends, such as sales or demand forecasts.

  • It's not designed for retrospective analysis of historical costs.

D. Amazon CloudWatch:

  • Amazon CloudWatch is a monitoring and observability service that collects and tracks metrics, logs, and events from various AWS resources.

  • While it can provide real-time metrics and logs related to EC2 and RDS instances, it doesn't offer historical cost analysis for the past year.
targetAudiences: Cloud beginners
AWS beginners
Anyone wanting to start their AWS certification journey

Manual testing is the process of manually testing software for defects. It requires a tester to play the role of an end user whereby they use most of the application's features to ensure correct behavior. However, it requires knowledge such as about different phases of the Software development life cycle, different types of Manual Testing, and different phases of the Software test life cycle.

Understanding what is Software testing?

Understanding the Software development process.

Understanding various Software development life cycle models.

Understanding the Role of Software testing phase in Software development

Understanding various Software test types.

Understanding various Software test levels.

Understanding Software test design techniques.

Understanding Software test life cycle

Understanding how to create & execute a test plan

Understanding how to document test cases

Understanding how to execute test cases and find defects.

Tracking defects, confirmation testing, and closing the defects.

Documenting of the test reports and test enclosure activities.

courseDetails.title: Job Order Costing System – Managerial Accounting
courseDetails.shortDescription: Navigating Cost Accounting: An In-Depth Exploration of Job Cost Systems in Managerial Accounting
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the comprehensive course on the Job Cost System and Managerial Accounting. Designed to enable learners to grapple with the complexities of cost accounting in a simplified and structured manner, this course is perfect for anyone seeking to augment their understanding of managerial accounting processes, particularly those revolving around job cost systems.

Starting with an introduction to managerial accounting topics, we delve into the nuanced realm of job cost systems and process cost systems. Recognizing that these two systems form the backbone of manufacturing cost accounting, we undertake a thorough comparative analysis to help you understand when and why a company would employ either of these systems.

We place significant emphasis on the classification of costs, dissecting its importance, and demonstrating various methodologies to classify costs effectively. This understanding is fundamental, as it forms the basis of cost flow in the accounting process within manufacturing companies.

Digging deeper into the job cost system, we traverse the intricate pathways of inventory cost flows. You'll gain insights into the movement of costs associated with raw materials, through work in process and factory overhead, before they culminate in finished goods and are eventually expensed as cost of goods sold.

In addition to theoretical aspects, we explore practical elements of a job cost system by discussing key documents integral to recording cost flows. We tackle overhead costs, a vital yet often misunderstood aspect of job cost systems. By clarifying the concept of actual overhead and estimated overhead applied to jobs, you'll learn to calculate the predetermined overhead rate, a crucial tool for estimating overhead allocations.

A significant portion of the course is dedicated to the practical application of knowledge acquired. We walk you through the recording of journal entries pertaining to costs at various stages of the job cost system. From transferring raw materials to work in process and factory overhead, to managing direct and indirect wages, to closing out finished jobs and recording the sale and costs of finished jobs - you'll be given hands-on exposure to real-world accounting scenarios.

With an emphasis on student interaction, this course also introduces discussion questions aimed at facilitating productive conversations between peers. These discussions offer the opportunity to approach the subject matter from multiple perspectives, enriching your overall learning experience.

Our course comes bundled with valuable resources to reinforce your understanding. We provide downloadable PDF Files for offline reference and preformatted Excel Practice Files to bolster your Excel proficiency. We also include multiple choice and short calculation practice questions to enhance your grasp of the material.

Under the guidance of an experienced instructor, a certified CPA and CGMA, Master of Science in Taxation, Certified Post-Secondary Instructor, and a seasoned Curriculum Development Expert, you are guaranteed a high-quality learning experience. With a wealth of experience in teaching, technical accounting, and software like QuickBooks Pro, your instructor provides an enriching learning environment that combines theory, practicality, and professional wisdom.

courseDetails.title: SQL Bootcamp - SQLite - Hands-On Exercises
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master SQL with Hands-On Exercises - Build Strong Data Management Skills and Excel in Database Development!
courseDetails.longDescription:
The "SQL Bootcamp - SQLite - Hands-On Exercises" course is an immersive, practical introduction to SQL programming using SQLite, a popular relational database system. This course is designed for both beginners with no prior knowledge of SQL, and seasoned developers looking to refine their skills or learn a new database system.

The course begins with a thorough introduction to SQLite, its architecture, and its place within the realm of SQL databases. You will learn how to set up and configure SQLite on your system, followed by an overview of database design principles and the SQL language.

The core part of the course comprises of extensive hands-on exercises. These exercises are specifically designed to facilitate learning through practice, enabling you to apply SQL concepts in real-world situations. You will learn how to create, update, and manipulate databases using SQLite, understand and implement complex queries, and get hands-on experience with transactions, indexing, and optimization for performance.

An essential feature of this course is its practical approach to learning. Rather than simply reading or listening to lectures, you will actively engage with the material by writing and executing SQL code. This allows for immediate feedback and iterative learning, helping to solidify your understanding of SQLite and SQL in general.

By the end of the "SQL Bootcamp - SQLite - Hands-On Exercises" course, you will have a strong grasp of SQL fundamentals, be confident in your ability to work with SQLite databases, and be well-equipped to tackle more complex SQL tasks and projects.


SQLite - Lightweight Database Powerhouse!

SQLite is a lightweight, serverless, and self-contained relational database management system. It is widely used as an embedded database in various applications due to its simplicity, small footprint, and high performance. SQLite stores the entire database in a single file, making it easy to deploy and manage without requiring a separate server process.

Despite its compact size, SQLite supports a full range of SQL features and provides ACID (Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability) compliance. It offers a reliable and efficient way to store and retrieve structured data, making it suitable for small to medium-sized applications, mobile devices, and embedded systems.

With SQLite, developers can create tables, define relationships, and execute SQL queries to perform various operations such as inserting, updating, deleting, and querying data. It supports common data types, transactions, indexes, and triggers, enabling efficient data manipulation and retrieval.

SQLite integrates seamlessly with different programming languages, including Python, C, C++, and more, making it highly versatile and widely adopted. It is used in a wide range of applications, such as mobile apps, desktop software, web browsers, IoT devices, and data analysis tools.

In summary, SQLite provides a lightweight and efficient solution for managing relational databases without the need for a dedicated database server. It offers simplicity, flexibility, and reliability, making it a popular choice for applications that require local data storage and retrieval.
targetAudiences: beginner or novice individuals who want to learn SQL from scratch and practice their skills with a hands-on approach using SQLite as the database management system

students or individuals pursuing a degree or certification in database management or data-related fields who need practical exercises to reinforce their understanding and proficiency in SQL using SQLite
professionals working with data or databases who want to enhance their SQL skills and gain experience in working with SQLite as a lightweight and easy-to-use database management system
software developers or programmers who want to add SQL and database management skills to their toolkit and want to start with SQLite as a stepping stone

  • Buying options requires a lesser initial expense than acquiring stock. The price of obtaining an option (premium and trading fee) is a lot cheaper than what a trader would have to spend to purchase outright shares.


  • Options trading lets investors freeze the price of their stock at a specified amount for a certain period. Depending on the category of the option used, the fixed stock price (also known as the strike price) guarantees that one will be able to trade at that rate at any point before the options contract expires.


  • Options trading improves a trader’s investment portfolio through added income, leverage, and even protection. A common way of using options to limit one’s downside losses is in the form of a hedge against the declining stock market. Furthermore, options can be used to produce a recurring source of income.
